name: InheritedModel
desc: An [InheritedWidget] that's intended to be used as the base class for models whose dependents may only depend on one part or "aspect" of the overall model.

nodes.name: InheritedModel Usage
desc: Below is a custom InheritedModel that implements subtree sharing of data; and defines two aspects, color and value, to control the granularity of dependency notifications.
